Save Avatar[COMMENT: AREA: Create a Manager; SUB-AREA: Make your 3D avatar; TONE: Formal; FR-BN 27636; NOTE: prompt dialog; title; AREA: Add new manager menu]
Load Avatar[COMMENT: AREA: Create a Manager; SUB-AREA: Make your 3D avatar; TONE: Formal; FR-BN 27636; NOTE: prompt dialog; title; AREA: Add new manager menu]
Add to Wishlist[COMMENT: AREA: start screen; FR: 35432 TONE: Formal; CHARLIMIT: None; NOTE: used in demo mode only to open url link to add game to users wishlist;]
Choose this option to exit [%string#1 - current name of game, e.g. FM2007] and return to the real world...[COMMENT - hint text for button to exit game]

I want to extend a huge thank you to the wider FM community who all, in their own way, inspire me every day. Below is a collection of people to whom I am especially grateful and have helped me in creating this skin, either through their own contributions to skinning, acting as a sounding board for my more outrageous ideas or providing feedback along the way.

string.value: An elder statesman of skinning, taught me a lot and been a wonderful sounding board. All round solid fella
For all the assistance to my many skinning queries
Tad Twenty was the first skin I used. Arguably to blame for me going down this rabbit hole!
For those base skins all those years ago
For all the assistance to my many skinning queries
For setting me down the path of pseudo-attributeless skinning
Also for setting me down the path of pseudo-attributeless skinning
For being fabulous sounding board and helping to push new ideas over the last 18 months
For entertaining late night conversations on completely inconsequential skinning related nonsense
For building my ego and helping me with various skinning queries
For all the assistance to my many skinning queries
For being a master of buttons
For his consistent, constructive feedback and help with Czech translations

translation.value: MustermannIconic isn't for everyone. But if you're looking for something else, here's a selection of skins that have either inspired me or I know are of a great quality. In alphabetical order, so I don't have to play favourites.
A selection of great FM YouTubers who are most definitely worth a watch. I may be a little biased, but if you only try one, I reckon that first fella is alright!

A selection of custom graphics that I either use or have used in the past to improve your FM experience. There are plenty other great alternatives on the linked sites, too, for you to choose what is most to your liking.
A selection of websites covering blogs, useful resources and general football analysis. By no means an exhaustive list, but all places I heartily recommend! In alphabetical order.
Xbox User[COMMENT: AREA: intro panel; NOTE: label for identifying user]
Switch Profile[COMMENT: AREA: intro panel; NOTE: label for switching user profile on console]
Photosensitivity Warning[COMMENT: AREA: Startup; SUB-AREA: Epilepsy Warning Screen; Note: Title for epilepsy warning]

This game contains flashing lights and footage with strobe lights which could trigger seizures or cause some discomfort amongst a small population of people.[COMMENT: AREA: Startup; SUB-AREA: Epilepsy Warning Screen; Note: Text for epilepsy warning, first line]

If you experience any unusual symptoms, including dizziness or disorientation please stop playing the game and consult your physician before resuming.[COMMENT: AREA: Startup; SUB-AREA: Epilepsy Warning Screen; Note: Text for epilepsy warning, second line]
